message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $18,000. I think it's a great deal for both of us, as you know it's worth a lot to you. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I believe we can reach a fair agreement. I am willing to pay $14,000 for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 just doesn't work for me.  I'm willing to come down to $16,000 to make this deal happen.  It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident this product will be worth every penny to you.  What do you say?

Thank you for your response, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose $15,000 as the price for the product. I believe this offers a fair compromise between the value of the product and what I am willing to pay.
